description: Returns information about all load balancers in an account.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request. To get a page token, perform an initial GetLoadBalancers request. If your results are paginated, the response will return a next page token that you can specify as the page token in a subsequent request.

nested_items.name: loadBalancers
nested_items.description: An array of LoadBalancer objects describing your load balancers.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the load balancer ( my-load-balancer).

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the load balancer.

nested_items.name: supportCode
nested_items.description: The support code. Include this code in your email to support when you have questions about your Lightsail load balancer. This code enables our support team to look up your Lightsail information more easily.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when your load balancer was created.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: regionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type ( LoadBalancer.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: The tag keys and optional values for the resource. For more information about tags in Lightsail, see the Amazon Lightsail Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: dnsName
nested_items.description: The DNS name of your Lightsail load balancer.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The status of your load balancer. Valid values are below.

nested_items.name: protocol
nested_items.description: The protocol you have enabled for your load balancer. Valid values are below.

nested_items.name: publicPorts
nested_items.description: An array of public port settings for your load balancer. For HTTP, use port 80. For HTTPS, use port 443.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: healthCheckPath
nested_items.description: The path you specified to perform your health checks. If no path is specified, the load balancer tries to make a request to the default (root) page.

nested_items.name: instancePort
nested_items.description: The port where the load balancer will direct traffic to your Lightsail instances. For HTTP traffic, it's port 80. For HTTPS traffic, it's port 443.

nested_items.name: instanceHealthSummary
nested_items.description: An array of InstanceHealthSummary objects describing the health of the load balancer.

nested_items.name: instanceName
nested_items.description: The name of the Lightsail instance for which you are requesting health check data.

nested_items.name: instanceHealth
nested_items.description: Describes the overall instance health. Valid values are below.

nested_items.name: instanceHealthReason
nested_items.description: More information about the instance health. If the instanceHealth is healthy, then an instanceHealthReason value is not provided.
Lb.RegistrationInProgress - The target instance is in the process of being registered with the load balancer.
Lb.InitialHealthChecking - The Lightsail load balancer is still sending the target instance the minimum number of health checks required to determine its health status.

nested_items.name: tlsCertificateSummaries
nested_items.description: An array of LoadBalancerTlsCertificateSummary objects that provide additional information about the SSL/TLS certificates. For example, if true, the certificate is attached to the load balancer.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the SSL/TLS certificate.

nested_items.name: isAttached
nested_items.description: When true, the SSL/TLS certificate is attached to the Lightsail load balancer.

nested_items.name: configurationOptions
nested_items.description: A string to string map of the configuration options for your load balancer. Valid values are listed below.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ipAddressType
nested_items.description: The IP address type of the load balancer.

nested_items.name: httpsRedirectionEnabled
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether HTTPS redirection is enabled for the load balancer.

nested_items.name: tlsPolicyName
nested_items.description: The name of the TLS security policy for the load balancer.

nested_items.name: nextPageToken
nested_items.description: The token to advance to the next page of results from your request.
